title: Issue Store Credit for a Return
description: A customer returns an item without a receipt and opts for store credit instead of a refund.

tasks.description: Identify the product being returned and its current selling price.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the product and its price.

tasks.description: Generate store credit for the value of the returned item.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a store credit voucher for the correct amount.

tasks.description: Add the store credit to the customer's account and email them the confirmation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully applies the credit and notifies the customer.
